testsuite.name: com.cbo.memcloud.feature.notes.NoteEditorViewModelTest

testcase.name: unarchiveNote should set isArchived to false
updateTitle should update the title in UI state
loadNote should set isLoading to false when note does not exist
archiveNote should set isArchived to true
saveNote should not save when title and content are blank
updateContent should update the content in UI state
deleteNotePermanently should set note to null
toggleFavorite should toggle favorite status of note
loadNote should update error state when exception is thrown
loadNote should update UI state with note when note exists
saveNote should update existing note when note exists
moveToTrash should set isDeleted to true
saveNote should create new note when note does not exist
